str2: And, even, also, namely.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Apparently a primary word; a female child, or descendant.
From Herodes; Herodias, a woman of the Heodian family.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Genitive Feminine Singular
str2: To go in, come in, enter. From eis and erchomai; to enter.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Genitive Feminine Singular
str2: To dance. Middle voice from orchos; to dance.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To please, with the idea of willing service rendered to others; hence almost: I serve. Probably from airo; to be agreeable.
Compound of heros and eidos; heroic; Herod, the name of four Jewish kings.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Dative Masculine Plural
str2: To recline at table with. From sun and anakeimai; to recline in company with.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A king, ruler, but in some passages clearly to be translated: emperor. Probably from basis; a sovereign.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A little girl, a young girl; a girl, maiden. Neuter of a presumed derivative of kore; a girl.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To ask, request, petition, demand. Of uncertain derivation; to ask.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
